site_name: Land East OfMaiden LaneCrayfordDartfordKentDA1 4LX
description: Application for a non-material amendment to provide for increase in eaves and ridge height of house type 2, amendments to house plots 1, 2 and 3, apartment internal layouts and some balconies in addition to minor alterations to car park layout, alterations to private amenity space (Plots 1 to 5, 8, 9, 10, 11, 13, 34 and 35) and reduction in redline boundary in the eastern part of the site, to the parent permission 19/00941/FULM. The parent permission being for a Demolition of existing buildings, rebuilding of the existing Barn to provide 35 residential units (Use Class C3) as Affordable Homes (Shared Ownership and Affordable Rent) comprising 22 x 2 bed flats, 1 x 2 bed house, 7 x 3 bed houses and 5 x 4 bed houses and provision of car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and associated infrastructure.
